description: Cook yourself up an easy Southern-style dinner in just 20 minutes. The whole family is bound to love these saucy, flavour-packed chicken skewers.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Quick & easy dinner,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Quick Louisiana-Style Chicken Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.33 cups Sunrice medium grain white calrose rice
500g Woolworths RSPCA approved chicken breast fillets, cut into 2.5cm pieces
220g Chicken Tonight Louisiana style BBQ chicken skewers cooking sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice according to packet instructions, following the absorption method.
Meanwhile, thread chicken onto 8 small metal skewers.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook skewers for 6 minutes, turning occasionally, or until golden and almost cooked through. Add sauce and reduce heat to medium-low. Cook for 2 minutes, turning, or until chicken is cooked through and sauce is hot
Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions. Divide rice and salad among plates. Top with skewers and serve sprinkled with coriander.
